706360.name: Physica-E
706360.description:
Story

"It's the most interactive, kid-friendly scientific show in the world!" critics say.
...
Physica-E is the best competitive show in the world! Kids can come down and compete against others to solve scientific questions and win the final prize!
...
But then the fire happened...

JoyzTV was known as one of the best TV companies out there; it was known mainly for it's hit show, Physica-E. Soon they bought robotic animatronics with the look of the Physica-E mascot, Matta. But then the studio burns down, and the animatronic starts attacking people. You're caught in the fire and knocked out by falling debris... You wake up in an unknown room. There's a hallway in front of you, and a locked door with a mail slot behind you; then the first letter comes in...



Gameplay

Roam throughout the unknown location, gather crafting materials to create items, and try to avoid the beast lurking inside with you... See how many days you can survive, and maybe even escape... Using unique gameplay mechanics, defend yourself against the threats lurking within you.



Extra Credits

SweetLikeCammy - First Donator

YOU - Checking this page out
